frontmatter.title: A meme for coercion
frontmatter.excerpt: Coercion is one of the most difficult things to understand in Javascript if you don't know how it's working behind the scenes and how types are applied when you are comparing to values.

frontmatter.title: Intro to big notation

frontmatter.title: How javascript engine works
frontmatter.excerpt: If we want to understand how javascript works beyond your code, you need to know three different concepts or ideas that you will see repeated throughout the rest of your life as a programmer.
